column4: Oh no, I forgot to buy an After Pill! What now?
Ugh... Looks like I will have to accept that she might get pregnant.
I want you to take the pill.""
...Ah, of course. I'll take one. You needn't worry.
Just the thought of having to take care of another little demon is tiring.
We're not yet of the age to have children anyway.
We must first grow up into splendid adults, before we can start thinking about children.
Thank you for being so understanding.

column5: I want you to have the baby.""

column4: Are you sure? We're still kids, you know?
How will we raise a child when we're still not settled?
Trust me, I'll think of something. Don't worry.
Oh? Finally going to become a reliable man for me?
If this is what'll push you into becoming a man I can depend upon, then alright.
I'll be waiting, so please do your best.
Remember that I'm always cheering for you.
